Reviews.Title: Great Camera
Reviews.Author: J. Thomas
Reviews.Content: Best inexpensive camera I've used. Compact, user friendly, takes really good pictures, lots of features, whats not to like? Buy it.

Reviews.Title: LOVE this camera!
Reviews.Author: jumpingoffplace
Reviews.Content: By far THE best digital camera I've ever used for taking pictures of my kids. I LOVE the "children" setting- you can take STUNNING pictures regardless of whether or not your little wiggle worm is wiggling. Fantastic. :) It has all the "pro" settings- and it's EASY to use. You will look like a professional photog with this camera- you can adjust lighting, flash, you can even adjust/edit after you've snapped the picture. This is my second purchase of this camera. My first one got broken (my fault) at my daughter's birthday party. I replaced it with another brand of camera and HATED it. Yes, it had many of the same features but the pictures never came out anywhere NEAR as good. I know this is an "old" camera- but don't let that fool you. For as long as I can get my hands on one of these, this is my camera of choice.

Reviews.Title: Seriously worth it and I've been through alot of cameras
Reviews.Author: jm
Reviews.Content: I highly recommend this camera. The beauty feature makes your skin look flawless. I've been through a lot of cameras and this one is my favorite. The pic quality is really good.

Reviews.Title: Samsung SL202 10.2MP Digital Camera with 3x Optical Zoom and 2.7 inch LCD
Reviews.Author: alpine
Reviews.Content: This Camara is Awesome it Takes Great Pictures & Great Video  & I Don't Have a Broken Lenes Issue Like 1 Reviewer Said I Believe That 1 That Bought it a Defective 1.

Reviews.Title: Just buy something elae
Reviews.Author: Me
Reviews.Content: Bad quality pictures. You get what you pay for. Save and buy something better. Lense broke with about 5 or less months of sparingly use.
